channel.title: Underground to Escape - Source game project
channel.description:
Hello :slight_smile:
I'd like to present you the mod I am currently working on, with a bunch of friends. It's called [url='https://www.moddb.com/mods/underground-to-escape'][i]Underground to Escape[/i][/url].
Basically, it will be half puzzle-game, half shooter, with what we think will be quite a unique plot and storyline. The project was born about 2 years ago, but as the current version has absolutely nothing to do with the original one, let's say it's more like 1 year old. If I were to define it by analogy, it would be a mix between Half-Life, Portal, drugs and french house.
It takes place in an office and its undergrounds, which will be the setting for very strange events. That's all we are ready to tell right now.
If you want to know more, don't hesitate to visit our [url='https://www.moddb.com/mods/underground-to-escape']ModDB page[/url], our [url='https://www.uteproject.net/']website[/url] and our [url='https://twitter.com/teambananagames']Twitter[/url]. And of course, here is the first teaser: [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NSV9h1umdlQ[/url]
More stuff is coming, so stay tuned!
Regards, [b]coolman756[/b]
PS: we are currently looking for all kind of artists (voice actor, choreographer, programmer, level designer, texture artist, 3d artist, etc). If you want to join us at Team Banana Games, don't hesitate to contact us at [email]uteproject@gmail.com[/email] or via ModDB.
![](upload://v3bL0J8ajGqATrWs1fYuB6JzzYC.png)

item.title: Underground to Escape - Source game project
item.dc:creator: Coolman
item.description:
Hello

I’d like to present you the mod I am currently working on, with a bunch of friends. It’s called Underground to Escape.

Basically, it will be half puzzle-game, half shooter, with what we think will be quite a unique plot and storyline. The project was born about 2 years ago, but as the current version has absolutely nothing to do with the original one, let’s say it’s more like 1 year old. If I were to define it by analogy, it would be a mix between Half-Life, Portal, drugs and french house.

It takes place in an office and its undergrounds, which will be the setting for very strange events. That’s all we are ready to tell right now.

If you want to know more, don’t hesitate to visit our ModDB page, our website and our Twitter.
And of course, here is the first teaser:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NSV9h1umdlQ

More stuff is coming, so stay tuned!

Regards,
coolman756

PS: we are currently looking for all kind of artists (voice actor, choreographer, programmer, level designer, texture artist, 3d artist, etc). If you want to join us at Team Banana Games, don’t hesitate to contact us at uteproject@gmail.com or via ModDB.
